messages.message: Core-platform-service has been keeping on restarting in both aihub-sandbox (https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/deployment-manager/logs?deployments=core-platform-service&pod=deployment-core-platform-service-584c9b9668-q5lmt&container=core-platform-service) and aihub-uat (https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/deployment-manager/logs?deployments=core-platform-service&pod=deployment-core-platform-service-5df65f6f79-8x4dv&container=core-platform-service). Seems to fail on the same issue :thread:
Huh, seems like it's back online....
Looks like it keeps crashing because of the issue above. I'll look deeper into it.
I was able to reproduce it locally.
I think this has to do with the review queue resource I deleted last Friday but I'm unsure why it's shown on aihub-uat as well.
@andy I saw a bunch of review queue entries in the acl_perms table created very recently (the latest one is from yesterday). Do you have ideas on why these are created?
Maybe these are created in Cypress tests?
Working on unit tests and i'll put up a PR soon.

This should fix the problem for aihub-sandbox. I need to dig deeper into what happened in uat
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/69392
ah, nvm. We just cut a new branch and deployed 25.14 to uat. Both env probably failed with the same issue
